select fr.friend_req_id as id, fr.send_member_id as sendMemberId, fr.receive_member_id as receiveMemberId, fr.req_date as reqDate, m.nickname as sendNickName from friend_request fr inner join member m on (m.member_id = fr.send_member_id) where 1 = 1 and fr.receive_member_id = #{memberId}
order by fr.req_date
